Enah Johnscott (onye a mụrụ Enah John Scott, 24 Machị 1982) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na Cameroon. Ihe nkiri ndị Johnscot mere gụnyere Triangle of tears (2011), Decoded (2012), Whispers (2013), The African Guest (2013) na The Fisherman's Diary (2020)

Ọ duziri usoro telivishọn Samba (2016) na Apple For Two (2017). Johnscot nwetara ndị na-ege ntị mba ụwa dịka onye nduzi maka ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2013 My Gallery nke gosipụtara onye na-eme ihe nkiri a mụrụ na Ghana bụ John Dumelo na Decoded nke gosipụtara Ghanain Van Vicker
A họọrọ Diary Fisherman dị ka ntinye Cameroon maka Best International Feature Film na 93rd Academy Awards.
Ihe nkiri mbụ Johnscot mere bụ Triangle of tears n'afọ 2011

FESPACO n'afọ 2017 họpụtara otu n'ime ọrụ ya na ndepụta nke asọmpi ihe nkiri na Burkina Faso maka usoro TV Samba N'afọ 2015, ọ meriri onye nduzi kachasị mma maka ihe nkiri Rose on the Grave site na Eleganzza Entertainment Awards na Cameroon.
A họpụtara ọrụ ya maka mbipụta nke 8 nke Ecrans Noirs n'afọ 2014 na ihe nkiri dịka My Gallery na Viri
